methods.name: Profile
methods.description: Returns data about an individual SC2 profile.

parameters.name: :id
parameters.description: The ID of the profile to retrieve.

parameters.name: :region
parameters.description: The region of the profile to retrieve.

parameters.name: :name
parameters.description: The name of the profile to retrieve.

parameters.name: locale
parameters.description: The locale to use in the response.

parameters.name: callback
parameters.description: Request for the data to be returned as a JSONP callback.

html:
Starcraft II community APIs provide China-specific endpoints for StarCraft II profiles.

Host Names

In China, requests use the following formats:

  • Blizzard API request paths: https://gateway.battlenet.com.cn
  • OAuth requests: www.battlenet.com.cn/{API path}.

APIs

StarCraft II supports the following APIs in China. For information about using Blizzard APIs, see Getting Started.
